org.jbox2d.particle

Class ParticleType

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jbox2d.particle.ParticleType

  • public class ParticleType
extends java.lang.Object
    The particle type. Can be combined with | operator. Zero means liquid.
    Author:
    dmurph
